issue.title: [CF 1084] Combat Event for Spell Immuned?
issue.body:
This might already exist and I'm too dumb to find it.

Want an event aura for when something is immuned, specifically on the player. IE an event to trigger when someone tries to CC me in an immune state, such as bladestorm (IE event triggers when freezing trap procs during my bladestorm).


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1084 | Raw

comments.body:
A little late, but it looks like this is a Spell Missed event in the combat log.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yea I forgot this thing existed but thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
